mapper.select:
SELECT CRS_ID, CRS_NM, CRS_ENM, GPS_X, GPS_Y, CRS_KIND, SIG_CTR_TYPE, MAIN_PHASE, PHASE_CNT, PERIOD_LEN, PERIOD_CNT, USE_YN, IMP_YN, REMARK
FROM BMS_CRS_MST WHERE DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND (CRS_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || CRS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND CRS_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND CRS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
SELECT CRS_ID, CRS_NM FROM BMS_CRS_MST WHERE DEL_YN!='Y' ORDER BY CRS_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into BMS_CRS_MST ( CRS_ID, CRS_NM, CRS_KIND, SIG_CTR_TYPE, USE_YN, REMARK, UPD_DTM, UPD_ID, IMP_YN )
values ( #{CRS_ID}, #{CRS_NM}, #{CRS_KIND}, #{SIG_CTR_TYPE}, #{USE_YN}, #{REMARK}, #{UPD_DTM}, #{SSN_USER_ID}, #{IMP_YN} );
